title: Presidential Nomination sent to the Senate, 05-12-09 | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 12, 2009

 



Presidential Nomination sent to the Senate, 05-12-09




 THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Press Secretary  _________________________________________________  For Immediate Release                      May 12, 2009 NOMINATION SENT TO THE SENATE:  Christine M. Griffin, of Massachusetts, to be Deputy Director of the Office of Personnel Management, vice Howard Charles Weizmann, resigned.
